sections.content: The GOVERN function defines the operating model for AI risk management. It establishes accountability, policies, and oversight rhythms that make MAP, MEASURE, and MANAGE executable in daily work.

sections.title: Why GOVERN matters
sections.content: Without role clarity and governance cadence, risk controls stay informal and inconsistent.

sections.caption: GOVERN connects strategy to risk execution across all core functions.
